posts.title: BREAKING: Republican lawmakers in Minnesota have introduced legislation to ban mRNA vaccines, labeling them as “weapons of mass destruction.”

twitter.content:
BREAKING: Republican lawmakers in Minnesota have introduced legislation to ban mRNA vaccines, labeling them as “weapons of mass destruction.”

The bill also proposes criminal penalties of up to 20 years in prison for their manufacture, distribution, or administration.
